articles.title: 'Once in a lifetime' comet filmed flying over Kent - Kent Online
articles.description: A comet "last seen by cavemen" is filmed flying over Kent by a photographer who stood waiting on a beach for six hours in freezing temperatures.
articles.content:
A comet "last seen by cavemen" was filmed zipping through the skies above Kent.
